articles.title: Messages in a bottle from WWI soldiers found on Australian coast - BBC
articles.description: The notes were thrown overboard just a few days into a voyage to join the battlefields of France more than a century ago.
articles.content:
Messages in a bottle written by two Australian soldiers in 1916 have been found more than a century later on the country's south-western coast.
The cheerful notes were penned just a few days into th… [+2498 chars]
